title: What will the leading trends be for data visualization in the next three years? - Quora

response.answer_text: I think over the next 3 years you'll continue to see the same trends as the broader BI space such as:  larger focus on mobile interfaces and devices for data visualizations  (tablets playing a large role)a drive toward more self-service capabilities that give end users more power to see what they need,  when they want it without requiring IT to deliver itcontinued focus on real-time data, specifically transactional data  (and the challenge of doing this in BIG DATA environments)and finally predictive analyticsThose are the areas we're focused on with Yurbi www.yurbi.com as we tackle the big issues facing enterprises now and into the future.
We spoke to 17 experts on where they see the data viz industry evolve in 2014 and this what they had to say: Data Visualization Predictions for 2014 Disclaimer: Am a writer at FusionCharts.
